sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"饥饿"之意。
means: hunger ： 普通用词，指人体对于食物迫切需要的正常生理现象。
famine ： 指因天灾人祸而引起大规模饥荒；用作引申，指严重缺乏某种物资或人力。
starvation语气比hunger强得多。指因长期缺乏食物所造成的痛苦，甚至死亡，侧重人为的灾难所致。

sentence.Network_en: 1.5 million people are in immediate danger of death from starvation.
sentence.Network_cn: 150万人正面临着被饿死的急迫危险。

sentence.Network_en: An estimated seven million people are at risk of starvation.
sentence.Network_cn: 估计有700万人面临着饿死的危险。

sentence.Network_en: I was suffering from acute sunstroke, starvation and exhaustion.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语作文说明文 _ 上海疯狂英语 ... 具有公平的土地所有权 have fair ownership of land 饥饿 starvation 耕地 farming land.
人教版高中英语单词表(第三册上必修) - 豆丁网 ... cocoa n. 可可树；可可粉 starvation n. 饥饿；饿死 raise vt. 饲养.
心理学专业词汇英语翻译(S) ... startle reflex 惊跳反射 starvation 绝食 stasiphobia 站立恐怖症.
高三英语单词列表_百度知道 ... thirst  n. 渴;渴望 starvation  n. 挨饿;饿死 anxiety  n. 忧虑;担心;焦虑.

list.abs: 1.3.1 血清饥饿法[1] 血清饥饿(serum starvation)是指在5d内将培养液中血清的浓度从15%或10%逐渐降为0.5%，迫使供体细胞退出细 …
oxygen mask 氧气面具oxygen starvation 氧气匮乏oxygen system 氧气系统
starvation 饥饿starvation diabetes 饥饿糖尿病state 状态
starvation 饥饿starvation cure 饥饿疗法stasis 停滞

means.word_mean: 饥荒,营养不足,耗尽,需要,缺乏

entry.def: Starvation is extreme suffering or death, caused by lack of food.

example.ex: Over three hundred people have died of starvation since the beginning of the year.
example.tran: 从年初起，已有 300 多人饿死。

means.word_mean: 1. a state of extreme hunger resulting from lack of essential nutrients over a prolonged period
2. the act of depriving of food or subjecting to famine;

sentences.sentence: "the beseigers used starvation to induce surrender"
"they were charged with the starvation of children in their care"

auth_sentence.content: Thousands of people died from starvation and illness alone.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thousands of people died from starvation and illness alone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thousands of people died from starvation and illness alone.

auth_sentence.content: Experiments had showed that starvation made roundworms live longer.
auth_sentence.res_content: Experiments had showed that starvation made roundworms live longer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Experiments had showed that starvation made roundworms live longer.

auth_sentence.content: Starvation causes a state similar to drug induced stupor.
auth_sentence.res_content: Starvation causes a state similar to drug induced stupor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Starvation causes a state similar to drug induced stupor.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,过程,结果"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上ication.

stems_affixes.word_buile: revoc=revoke废除+ation行为,过程,结果→n.废弃,取消

stems_affixes.value_cn: 结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
stems_affixes.word_buile: combine联合+ation行为,过程,结果→n.结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
confirm证实+ation行为,过程,结果→n.证实,确定;确认
determine决心+ation行为,过程,结果→n.决心;决定;确定
excite使兴奋+ation行为,过程,结果→n.刺激;激动;激发
exclaim叫喊;感叹+ation行为,过程,结果→n.叫喊;感叹
ex出去+plan明白+ation行为,过程,结果→使其明白→解释,解说
generalize一般的+ation行为,过程,结果→n.一般化;概括,综合

stems_affixes.value_cn: 想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: imagine设想+ation行为,过程,结果→n.想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
stems_affixes.word_buile: incline倾斜;偏向+ation行为,过程,结果→n.倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
lament悲伤,哀悼+ation行为,过程,结果→n.悲痛,哀悼,痛哭
limit限制+ation行为,过程,结果→n.限制,局限性
oblige迫使,责成+ation行为,过程,结果→n.义务,责任
present赠送+ation行为,过程,结果→n.介绍;赠送;呈现
provoc=provoke激怒+ation行为,过程,结果→n.激怒
recommend赞扬;推荐+ation行为,过程,结果→n.推荐,介绍[信],劝告,建议
represent描述,表示+ation行为,过程,结果→n.描写;陈述;代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保留意见;预定,预订
stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve保留,储备;预定+ation行为,过程,结果→reservation保留
starve使饿死+ation行为,过程,结果→n.饥饿

sentences.en: Edible wild herbs kept us from dying of starvation.
sentences.cn: 我们靠着野菜才没被饿死。

sentences.en: After three days without food, the men were close to starvation.
sentences.cn: 3 天没吃东西，这些人都快饿死了。

sentences.en: The animals had died of starvation.
Disease often follows on starvation because the body is weakened.
sentences.cn: 疾病的产生往往是由于饥饿的缘故,因为身体很虚弱。

sentences.en: A bishop was making a speech about world starvation.
sentences.cn: 主教正在做一个关于全球性饥荒的演讲。
